00346 inline uint32 
00347 PushService::getLastAccessTimeForResource( 
00348    SubscriptionResource& resource ) const 
00349 {
00350    PushResourceDataMap::const_iterator it = 
00351       m_resourceData.find( SubscriptionResourceNotice( resource ) );
00352    if ( it != m_resourceData.end() ) {
00353       return it->second->getTimeForLastProviderContact();
00354    } else {
00355       return MAX_UINT32;
00356    }
00357 }
00358 
00359 
00360 inline uint32 
00361 PushService::getNumberResources() const {
00362    return m_resourceData.size();
00363 }
00364 
00365 
00366 inline void
00367 PushService::removeAllResources( PacketContainerList& packetList ) {
00368    PushResourceDataMap::iterator it = m_resourceData.begin();
00369 
00370    while ( it != m_resourceData.end() ) {
00371       packetList.push_back( makeUnSubscribePacket( *(it->first) ) );
00372       delete it->second;
00373       ++it;
00374    }
00375    m_resourceData.clear();
00376 }
00377 
00378 
00379 inline bool 
00380 PushService::removeResource( SubscriptionResource& resource, 
00381                              PacketContainerList& packetList ) 
00382 {
00383    PushResourceDataMap::iterator it = 
00384       m_resourceData.find( SubscriptionResourceNotice( resource ) );
00385    if ( it != m_resourceData.end() ) {
00386       packetList.push_back( makeUnSubscribePacket( resource ) );
00387       delete it->second;
00388       m_resourceData.erase( it );
00389       return true;
00390    } else {
00391       return false;
00392    }
00393 }
